title: Example Project
description: Complete metadata schema v2.0 example with inline comments

conversion-first.name: Conversion First
conversion-first.description: Hero form above the fold for minimal friction
conversion-first.emphasis: Keeps the CTA visible for warm audiences already familiar with value prop
conversion-first.when: Use for nurture campaigns, remarketing traffic, and warm leads
conversion-first.hypothesis: Reducing friction and presenting immediate conversion path increases qualified demo requests

trust-forward.name: Trust Forward
trust-forward.description: Methodology and proof points before CTA
trust-forward.emphasis: Show research rigor and credibility for colder audiences
trust-forward.when: Use for net-new evaluators, paid search, and top-of-funnel traffic

data-deep-dive.name: Data Deep Dive
data-deep-dive.when: Use for technical evaluators who need comprehensive evidence
data-deep-dive.hypothesis: Data-driven personas convert better when given full analytical depth

sections.name: Hero
sections.whyNow: Orient the visitor and surface the value proposition immediately

jtbd.situation: Visitor lands via campaign link or organic search
jtbd.motivation: Quickly assess if this content is relevant to their needs
jtbd.outcome: Decide to explore further or proceed to conversion

sections.name: Overview
sections.whyNow: Provide context about the research and its scope

jtbd.situation: Visitor wants to understand what the report covers
jtbd.motivation: Confirm the research is relevant and credible
jtbd.outcome: Feel confident this is worth their time

sections.name: Key Findings
sections.whyNow: Present high-value insights early for quick decision-making

jtbd.situation: Visitor is evaluating the quality and relevance of insights
jtbd.outcome: Identify findings relevant to their challenges

sections.name: Methodology
sections.whyNow: Build credibility through transparent research practices

jtbd.situation: Visitor wants to assess data quality and rigor
jtbd.outcome: Trust the findings enough to act on them

sections.name: CTA
sections.whyNow: Convert interested visitors into qualified leads

jtbd.situation: Visitor is convinced of value and ready to engage
jtbd.outcome: Submit form and receive promised value

sections.name: FAQ
sections.whyNow: Address common objections and questions before conversion

jtbd.outcome: Overcome objections and proceed to CTA
